title: Conveyed Our Hearts
alternative_title: Conveyed Our Hearts, 우리의 마음을 전해준
status: Conveyed Our Hearts, 우리의 마음을 전해준
description:
Description :
        Conveyed Our Hearts,   at manhwawebsiteHaejun, a transfer student who transferred at a suspicious time. No matter how you look at him, he looks like a punk, but for some reason, he only approaches Woorim, the class president. "Lee Woorim, I want to sit next to you." Woorim is faced with a choice: as the class president, should he take care of the transfer student, or as an honor student, should he distance himself from the seemingly delinquentMaybe you like !
